text: @JoeBiden BTW, Covid-19 will be with the 🌎4 years to come until all can be vaccinated. That means the uninsured or those with inadequate coverage will potentially face insurmountable costs for care if needed. Also cos will be repairing their margins by cutting costs like healthcare.
